title: The 2012 Movie Draft
description:
‘Tenet’ is struggling at the box office. The MCU is on pause. And TV is threatening to take over our beloved movies. So we have to return to the past. That’s right: The movie draft is back. Chris Ryan rejoins Sean and Amanda to make their picks for the best of 2012 (1:17). Then screenwriter Billy Ray joins the show to talk about his Showtime miniseries ‘The Comey Rule' (1:31:54).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guests: Chris Ryan and Billy Ray
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
